title: ‘The Killing Joke’ Has Been Given The OK To Be The First R-Rated ‘Batman’ Experience
text:
‘The Killing Joke’ Has Been Given The OK To Be The First R-Rated ‘Batman’ Experience 
Published By: Uproxx - Today 
So as was revealed back during San Diego Comic Con, Batman: The Killing Joke is making its way to the animated world of the DC Universe. Bet...
